mapper.select: select * from boardFR order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into boardFR values((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from boardfr), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, null, 0)
mapper.update: update boardFR set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where num=#{num}
update boardFR set writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
